content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
Want to add a forms to choose you preferer color of door
Please go to the "Components" tab in the MakeInfinite studio and drag and drop a forms component into the canvas. Let me know when you've done that so I can assist you further!
do it in the header

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732096697","change_description":"add a form for selecting preferred door color","acknowledgement_message":"Okay, I'm editing the header component to include a form for selecting the preferred door color."}

I've added a form in the header component for selecting the preferred door color. You can now see a dropdown menu with color options. If you need any further modifications or additional features, just let me know!
when the different options are selected, the title should change to those

content: Okay, I'm updating the header component to change the title based on the selected door color.

I've updated the header component so that the title will change based on the selected door color. It will now display "DoorMaster - [Selected Color] Door" when a color is chosen. If you have any more adjustments or features in mind, feel free to share!
I want to generate a calculator that when red color is selected, adds two numbers, when blue and green multiplies and when yellow substracts
Please go to the "Components" tab and drag and drop a calculator component into the canvas. Once you've done that, let me know so I can assist you in making it work with the color selections!
you have to do this in the Header1732096697/

content: Okay, I'm updating the header component to include calculator functionality based on the selected door color.

I've integrated calculator functionality into the header component based on the selected door color. It now displays a price that changes according to your choice: adding for red, multiplying for blue and green, and subtracting for yellow. If you need further modifications or additions, just let me know!
there sholud be inputs for the 2 numbers
